titleStmt.title: The compleat constable directing all [brace] constables, headboroughs, tithingmen, churchwardens, overseers of the poor, surveyors of the highways, and scavengers in duty of their several offices according to the power allowed them by the laws and statutes, continued to this present time, 1692 : also directions for the London constables, to which is added a treatise of warrants and commitments proper for the knowledge of all constables, &c.
titleStmt.author: Gardiner, Robert.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the assigns of Richard and Edward Atkins ..., and are to be sold by Abel Roper ..., and Tho. Beaver ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
